attributes.action: prevent Royal Bank of Scotland Group [RBS] from paying £1 billion of taxpayers' money as bonuses to its staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On the back of John Prescott's iPetition & facebook campaign I would encourage all taxpayers (who are now 68% shareholders in RBS) to sign this petition asking that the PM prevent £1 billion of taxpayers' money being paid to the staff of RBS as bonuses.

RBS posted losses of £28 billion last year and were bailed out by the taxpayers' purse to the tune of £20 billion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
